Container.Name: FTBDirewolf20_118
Container.Overview: FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.18 Modded Minecraft Server[br][br][b]FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.18[/b][br]Play along with the Direwolf20 as he starts a brand new series on his YouTube channel or join friends on a server and choose your own route. [br]Version tags available:[br] - 1.10.2[br] - 1.10.1[br] - 1.10.0[br] - 1.9.1[br] - 1.9.0[br] - 1.8.0[br] - 1.7.0[br] - 1.5.1[br] - 1.4.1[br] - 1.4.0[br] - 1.3.1[br] - 1.2.0[br] - 1.0.0[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

Config.Name: LEVEL
Config.Description: Name of the world directory. It is usually world.
